mil3.2.3:1.2_0: “bhante nāgasena, yassa ñāṇaṁ uppannaṁ, tassa paññā uppannā”ti?
mil3.2.3:1.3_0: “Āma, mahārāja, yassa ñāṇaṁ uppannaṁ, tassa paññā uppannā”ti.
mil3.2.3:1.6_1: taññeva ñāṇaṁ sāyeva paññā uppannā, kiṁ sammuyheyya so, udāhu na sammuyheyyā”ti?
mil3.2.3:1.9_0: “Aññātapubbesu vā, mahārāja, sippaṭṭhānesu, agatapubbāya vā disāya,
mil3.2.3:1.11_1: tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, tahiṁ na sammuyheyyā”ti.
mil3.2.3:2.2_1: kocideva puriso andhakāragehe padīpaṁ āropeyya, tato andhakāro nirujjheyya, āloko pātubhaveyya;
mil3.2.3:3.2_2: yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī”ti.
mil3.2.3:4.1_1: yaṁ panetaṁ brūsi ‘paññā sakiccayaṁ katvā tattheva nirujjhati,
mil3.2.3:4.1_2: yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ “aniccan”ti vā “dukkhan”ti vā “anattā”ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī’ti, tassa opammaṁ karohī”ti.
mil3.2.3:4.2_1: yo koci puriso rattiṁ lekhaṁ pesetukāmo lekhakaṁ pakkosāpetvā padīpaṁ āropetvā lekhaṁ likhāpeyya,
mil3.2.3:4.3_2: yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī”ti.
mil3.2.3:5.2_1: puratthimesu janapadesu manussā anugharaṁ pañca pañca udakaghaṭakāni ṭhapenti ālimpanaṁ vijjhāpetuṁ,
mil3.2.3:5.2_2: ghare paditte tāni pañca udakaghaṭakāni gharassūpari khipanti, tato aggi vijjhāyati, kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja,
mil3.2.3:5.2_3: tesaṁ manussānaṁ evaṁ hoti ‘puna tehi ghaṭehi ghaṭakiccaṁ karissāmā’”ti?
mil3.2.3:5.3_0: “Na hi, bhante, alaṁ tehi ghaṭehi, kiṁ tehi ghaṭehī”ti?
mil3.2.3:5.4_1: evaṁ pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ.
mil3.2.3:5.5_0: Yathā te manussā, evaṁ yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo.
mil3.2.3:5.8_2: yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī”ti.
mil3.2.3:6.2_1: vejjo pañcamūlabhesajjāni gahetvā gilānakaṁ upasaṅkamitvā tāni pañcamūlabhesajjāni pisitvā gilānakaṁ pāyeyya, tehi ca dosā niddhameyyuṁ, kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja,
mil3.2.3:6.2_2: tassa vejjassa evaṁ hoti ‘puna tehi pañcamūlabhesajjehi bhesajjakiccaṁ karissāmī’”ti?
mil3.2.3:6.4_1: evaṁ pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ, yathā vejjo, evaṁ yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo.
mil3.2.3:6.6_0: Yathā byādhito puriso, evaṁ puthujjano daṭṭhabbo.
mil3.2.3:6.7_3: niddhamitā ca kilesā na puna sambhavanti.
mil3.2.3:6.8_2: yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī”ti.
mil3.2.3:7.2_1: saṅgāmāvacaro yodho pañca kaṇḍāni gahetvā saṅgāmaṁ otareyya parasenaṁ vijetuṁ,
mil3.2.3:7.2_2: so saṅgāmagato tāni pañca kaṇḍāni khipeyya, tehi ca parasenā bhijjeyya, kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja,
mil3.2.3:7.2_3: tassa saṅgāmāvacarassa yodhassa evaṁ hoti ‘puna tehi kaṇḍehi kaṇḍakiccaṁ karissāmī’”ti?
mil3.2.3:7.3_0: “Na hi, bhante, alaṁ tehi kaṇḍehi, kiṁ tehi kaṇḍehī”ti?
mil3.2.3:7.4_1: evaṁ pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ.
mil3.2.3:7.5_0: Yathā, mahārāja, saṅgāmāvacaro yodho, evaṁ yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo.
mil3.2.3:7.7_2: bhaggā ca kilesā na puna sambhavanti.
mil3.2.3:7.8_2: yaṁ pana tāya paññāya kataṁ ‘aniccan’ti vā ‘dukkhan’ti vā ‘anattā’ti vā, taṁ na nirujjhatī”ti.
